= Binder =
http://bit.ly/scipy-2018-binder

Reproducible jupyter environments

Binderhub:
* generates docker containers from github repor using repo2docker
* generates jupyterhub sessions by using kubernetes
* connects user to notebook

jupyterhub + kubernetes = kubespawner

http://mybinder.org is open source hosted service for binder
http://binderhub.readthedocs.io
http://z2jh.jupyter.org
